titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Cybersecurity Awareness Month to raise awareness about, and enhance the state of, cybersecurity in the United States.
A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Cybersecurity Awareness Month to raise awareness about, and enhance the state of, cybersecurity in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the Senate's support for the goals and ideals of National Cybersecurity Awareness Month and pronounces the Senate's commitment to enhancing U.S. cybersecurity through continued cooperation with federal agencies, businesses, educational institutions, and other organizations.
